DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare the impact of two non-medicinal strategies: the breast-feeding and saccharose to measure effects in cerebral cortex during pain using near infrared spectroscopy (NIRS)
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of the Procedural Pain in the Newborn
DOC.detailed_description: Many studies of non-medicinal treatments(saccharose and breast-feeding)show a decrease of expression of pain in newborn. However Slater and al questioned these practices due to the absence of modification of the cerebral answer measured by evoked potential.
